```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

library(bookdown)
library(knitr)
library(lubridate)
data <- read.csv("DATA/Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019.csv")
dim(data)

unique(data$Offence.Subdivision)

```
```{r bribery}
Bribery <- data %>% 
  filter(Offence.Subdivision == "B60 Bribery") %>% 
select (c("Year","Year.ending","Offence.Subdivision","Incidents.Recorded")) %>% 
  arrange(Year)

Bribery



```

```{r plot}
plot1 <- ggplot(data = Bribery,
                aes(x = Year,
                          y= Incidents.Recorded)) +
                     geom_line()
plot1
```
